ComicInfo.Penciller: Jack Sparling,John Forte,Kurt Schaffenberger,Ken Landau,John Forte,Jack Sparling,Ken Landau
ComicInfo.Summary:
The daughter of an evil witch who was executed during the Salem witch trials wants to help people rather than hurt them like her mother did.
Lance Sabin finds a golden city under the Antarctic ice, but had to leave it to help his crew, and now searches for the city once more.
A crew of space travelers visit the giant planet Xenon which is populated by giant humanoid monstrosities that consider human explorers as pests.
ComicInfo.Title: The Legend of the Good Witch!; Your Future in the Clouds!; Golden City!; Welcome to Xenon!
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
